title: U.S. chief knew Volkswagen could be breaking emissions rules 18 months ago
text:
Published By: Reuters - Business - Today 
BERLIN (Reuters) - Volkswagen's top U.S. executive will tell a panel of U.S. lawmakers on Thursday that he knew as long ago as the spring of...
